thread.title: You’ll Want to Spend Every Friday In This Gym That Looks Like a Nightclub
thread.title_full: You’ll Want to Spend Every Friday In This Gym That Looks Like a Nightclub

author: ahrustic1
title: You’ll Want to Spend Every Friday In This Gym That Looks Like a Nightclub
text:
Your Privacy Rights Canadian Customers 
If you want to take your Friday night happy hour to the next level, don’t hit the club—hit the gym: Every weekend, stressed New Yorkers gather together for Noho Nights , a sweat session designed to help you blow off steam the way your typical bar night would, according to a New York Post report. The class takes place at Barry’s Bootcamp, but make no mistake, it doesn’t look like your average steel gray gym. With red lights beaming and EDM beats bumping, you’d think you were at any other raging nightclub in the city. 
Thirty-one-year-old trainer Matty Maggiacomo and his 29-year-old DJ boyfriend Aaron Aanenson started the class. While Aanenson performs a set, Maggiacomo puts the class through a hellish, hour-long, full-body workout with a mix of cardio and high-intensity interval training. Advertisement
